admin.Title: Admin Only Command
admin.Body: This command can only be run by admins of your server. Type **/help** to get a list of available commands.

commandlock.Title: Commands Locked
commandlock.Body: You are currently in an interaction that prevents use of this command. Complete the other command, then try again.

elitefourlock.Title: Elite Four Lock
elitefourlock.Body: You are currently going through an Elite Four Challenge! This command will be unlocked once you fail or complete the challenge.

server.Title: Server Not Registered
server.Body: This server has not been registered with PokeTrainer! To do so, have an administrator run the **/register** command. Type **/help** for more explanation on how PokeTrainer is used.

trainer.Title: Trainer Missing!
trainer.Body: You or the target user have not started a PokeTrainer journey yet! To do so, use the **/starter** command. Type **/help** for more explanation on how PokeTrainer is used.
